titles.ar: بَابُ فَضْلِ الرُّجُوعِ إِلَى الْمَدِينَةِ
titles.en: Chapter 215 – The merits of the returning to Al-Medina (after performing Hajj)

titles.ar: بَابُ فَضْلِ الرُّجُوعِ إِلَى الْمَدِينَةِ
titles.en: Chapter 215 – The merits of the returning to Al-Medina (after performing Hajj)

verses.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ هِشَامِ بْنِ الْمُثَنَّى عَنْ سَدِيرٍ عَنْ أَبِي جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ ابْدَءُوا بِمَكَّةَ وَ اخْتِمُوا بِنَا .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Hisham Bin Al Musna, from Sadeyr, 
(It has been narrated) from Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘Begin with Makkah and end with us<sup>asws</sup> (at Al-Medina)’.

verses.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ عَنْ أَبِيهِ قَالَ سَأَلْتُ أَبَا جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) أَبْدَأُ بِالْمَدِينَةِ أَوْ بِمَكَّةَ قَالَ ابْدَأْ بِمَكَّةَ وَ اخْتِمْ بِالْمَدِينَةِ فَإِنَّهُ أَفْضَلُ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Ali Bin Muhammad Bin Abdullah, from Ahmad Bin Abu Abdullah, from his father who said, 
‘I asked Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup>, ‘Shall I begin with Al-Medina or with Makkah?’ He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Begin with Makkah and end with Al-Medina, for it is superior’.
